inn1.comm: good start for Taylor as he bangs it in short and kicks up on Tharanga who just manages to sway away, it is a loopy kind of bounce
Tharanga pushes at it rather feebly outside off and is beaten, just a hint of away movement for Taylor
this time Tharanga plays at it with an angled bat and he glides it down to third man
solid start for Mahela Udawatte as he gets nicely behind the line and taps it firmly to mid-off
dishes out a yorker length ball outside off and Udawatte goes for an expansive drive and misses
another big swing and a miss outside off and Udawatte meets thin air, Taylor only holds the length back a little
fires in a yorker and gets it to swing back in, Tharanga goes for the drive but gets an inside edge down to fine leg
slightly slower and he sticks to the full length, he chips it slightly uppishly to mid-on

look at that stump roll.... Edwards lets out a screeching yorker on off stump and gets it to move away late, Udawatte is beaten for pace and movement and is too late in getting his bat down and he looks back to see his offstump go for a toss
Edwards attempts another yorker but this time he dishes out a low  full toss and Sangakkara taps it softly to mid-on
slides towards the pads, he tries to flick it off but meets the ball on the pads instead
fullish outside off, he taps it softly to mid-off
gets a bit of inward movement, it lands on a fullish length and he taps it to mid-off
holds the length back, comes back in with the angle, he defends solidly back to the bowler
stays on the backfoot, he shapes to tuck it to the onside but he opens the face of the bat at the last moment and steers it to Benn at third man
good length on middle and off, he gets behind the line and defends
he sprays it full and too wide outside off, he stretches out and scoops it over the covers for the first boundary of the match
bangs it in on a good length on legstump, he gets back and tucks it to the on side
pitches it outside off this time and gets good carry through to the keeper Browne
bangs that in shorter, Tharanga taps it softly towards Bravo at point and there's a lot of hesitancy in the running, Tharanga is sent back but the thrown was wide
digs it in short again and this one really fizzes past Tharanga as he weaves away from it
sticks to the same length , pitches it short and he hops for the defence
sprays it wide outside off and bangs in short, he flashes at it without moving his feet
fuller in length and swinging in on the pads, he shuffles and tucks it towards square leg
fullish outside off and swinging back in, he gets a half stride forward and pushes it to mid-off
pitches on a good length outside off, he taps it to the offside
gets forward and defends again
full and swinging in on the pads, it lands on the slot for the on drive and Sangakkara flicks it with his wrists and beats the gap between midwicket and mid-on
bangs in a bouncer but it doesn't bounce as much, it;s directed at his face but he adjusts well and hooks it to fine leg
slides down the leg side, he attempts to flick but misses
short of a length outside off, Sangakkara isn't in control of the pull but he gets enough elevation to clear mid-on
sprays that really wide outside off and gets good away movement too, he goes for the drive but misses
beaten, good delivery by Edwards as he pitches it on offstump and gets it to move away just a little, enough to beat the Sangakkara's half hearted poke
adjusts to a shorter length and gets good carry as it leaves the left hander
sprays that wide outside off again, this one pitches and moves away
appeal for a leg before but he gets an inside edge, Sangakkara tries to cover the inswing and drive through the line but gets an edge onto his pad
gets across and tucks it just wide of midwicket, Sammy nearly loses his footing as he stops it
superb shot, Edwards pitches it up on the pads and gets it to curve in, Sangakkara gets across and flicks it on the up to bisect the gap between midwicket and mid-on
pitches it outside off and gets it to go through straight to the keeper
short outside leg, he flicks it high towards fine-leg and Edwards falls over as he tries to save it, luckily he manages to pull it back
good delivery by Bravo as he lands it outside off and gets it to shoot through and beat the outside edge
hits a good length on middle and off, he gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
pitches outside off, he plays it down with an angled bat and steers it to point
Bravo errs in line and feeds it on the pads, he gets his wrists working and flicks it just wide of the diving square leg fielder and the quick outfield does the rest
hits a good length on off and middle, he covers the line and defends back to the bowler
good delivery by Edwards, he pitches it outside off and gets it to climb up, he pokes his bat out and misses
stays on middle and leg, that's the danger area for Edwards and it's all too easy for Sangakkara as he flicks it wide of square leg
shorter in length and sticks to the same line, he works it to the on side
strays too wide outside off and gets it to move away, he goes for the expansive drive but the ball was too wide for any kind of stroke
lovely shot, Edwards strays on the shins and pitches it up, Sangakkara waits for it and eases it with an aerial flick high over square leg, poor line and  length from Edwards
pitches outside off and Sangakkara punches it hard to Samuels at cover
pitches on a fullish length outside off, he's not exerting himself much, he taps it to mid-off
bangs it in shorter and the ball holds its line, he gets back and defends
slides down the leg side, Tharanga goes for an uppish flick and misses
fuller in length outside off, he lunges forward and drives to cover
fullish and slightly wide again, he gets forward and chops it down to the covers
pitches it shorter outside off, he gets across and defends
he gets his bat down on an angle and softly defends it in front of cover

tame dismissal and Sangakkara's ordinary tour continues, Taylor pitches it up outside off and invites the drive, Sangakkara shapes to scoop it over backward point but doesn't get the desired elevation, Bravo takes it comfortably at waist height. Replays showed Taylor bowling from a yard behind the popping crease
lands it on a good length outside off and gets a little away movement before reaching Browne
lands it on a fuller length on the pads, the ball holds its line and he drives through the line to mid-on
pitched up outside off, he gets forward and steers it with an angled bat wide of gully
the slower ball, Tharanga waits on it and angles it down to third man
pitches outside off, Jayawardene gets a good stride forward and defends to point
lands slightly wide outside off,  not much away movement before reaching the keeper
Tharanga shapes to flick it to the on side and gets a thick inside edge which hits his pad and nearly rolls onto the stumps
pitches that slightly fuller outside off and Tharanga nearly falls for the bait with an expansive drive, he's beaten
pitches outside off and moves away, Tharanga stays rooted to the crease and goes for the drive through the covers, he only manages a thick inside edge which shaves his offstump
gets forward and taps it softly in front of mid-on and sets off quickly
pitches outside off and holds its line, Jayawardene plays a poor shot and fishes outside off
well bowled, pitched up outside off and holds its line, he too fishes outside off
lands on off and middle, he gets back and taps this to mid-on
lovely delivery again, Taylor pitches it on the corridor outside off, Chamara Silva pokes forward and nearly gets an edge
gets his feet moving this time and defends back to the bowler
holds the length back outside off, Silva shoulders arms
lands on a good length on middle, he softly taps it down to mid-on, that ends an impressive maiden over by Taylor
fullish on  middle and leg, he gets forward and tucks it on the walk to mid-on, just beats the diving Bravo
fullish on the pads and he whips it off his pads, Devon Smith does well ar midwicket to slide and intercept it

the top order capitulates....Bravo pitches it up outside off, Jayawardene gets down and goes for the square drive, he ends up playing it straight to Chanderpaul. Sangakkara too fell to in identical manner, both failed to get the elevation to clear the infield
shapes to drive straight but he turns the bat and plays it softly to mid-on
lands on a good length outside off, he shoulders arms
Silva closes the face of the bat and steers it towards midwicket, they turn down the single
the slower ball but it doesn't pay off for Taylor as Silva waits on it and drives firmly past mid-off who's fielding up close, the lightening outfield carries it through
the quicker ball,lands outside off and holds its line before reaching the keeper
taps it down in front of cover and they set off quickly for a well-judged single
pitches outside off and there's no lateral movement for Taylor, Dilshan shoulders arms
jams in the yorker on middle and leg, and Dilshan reads it early and digs it out well
lands it on a full length outside off, he goes for the offdrive but mistimes it to mid-off
fullish again, Dilshan pushes it softly in front of mid-off and sets off quickly, Edwards loses his footing as he tries to save it
excellent running again as he taps it softly in front of cover and sets off
superb delivery, he fires that in on the corridor outside off and gets it to rear up, that wasn't very far from the outside edge

pitches it on a good length on off and gets it to move away a little, Dilshan pokes forward but fails to cover the line as the ball clips the outside edge and carries through to Browne. Bravo set him up the previous delivery with a jaffa and he was rewarded
bangs it in short and rears up on his body, he uneasily fends it off his gloves
pitches outside off, he steers it down towards point
appeal for a legbefore, Silva gets forward and defends close to his pad, the ball appears to strike him in front of offstump, replays showed a slight inside edge

Appeal for a run-out! Silva tucks it in front of Bravo at midwicket and sets off, Kapugedera hesitates and goes through with the single, he was ball watching and that slowed him down, Bravo dives and attacks the stumps with a direct hit, the third umpire has a look, Kapugedera's safe
hits a good length outside off, he gets forward and defends
keeps it outside off, he gets back and defends towards cover
thuds it in short on the body, he hops back and fends it to the on side
appeal for a leg before, Kapugedera lunges forward and meets the ball high over the knee roll, Bravo appeals and Taufel shakes his head
slides on the pads, he gets back and flicks to fine leg
pitches outside off and holds its line before reaching the keeper
lands it outside off and gets extra bounce and carry before reaching the keeper
lands it on a much fuller length, he gets a huge stride forward and defends
Bravo strays on the pads and he nudges it off his pads and beats Browne, Bravo's frustrated for erring in line
lands it on a full length and gets away movement, he drives straight to cover
bangs it in shorter and makes Kapugedera hop on the backfoot as he tucks it to fine leg
adjusts to a fuller length outside off, he lunges forward and steers it to cover
holds the length back outside off, he safely shoulders arms and watches it through to the keeper
hits a fuller length, he gets forward and drives to cover
sticks to the same line and length, Silva gets a half stride forward and taps it to cover
this one kicks up quite a bit on him and catches him by surprise, yet he manages to drop his bat and fend it towards cover
keeps it short and directs it at his body, he tucks it to the on side

risky... Bravo pitches it up outside off, he stays rooted to the crease and goes for the uppish drive, he checks his stroke and just beats Taylor's outstretched arms at mid-off. Taylor was standing fairly close too
aims it at his body, he hops and fends it off to the on side
he hops at the crease again and places it to Sammy at short square leg, he's stationed there for the short ball which could lob off the gloves
fuller on the pads, he fends it to the on side
digs it in short but Silva controls it well and tucks it softly in front of midwicket and calls quickly
sticks to the same line and length, directs it at the body and he works it to the on side
a little too short, Kapugedera reads the length early and the ball sits up nicely for him as he swivels and pulls it high over square leg
gets forward and pushes it to mid-off
adjusts to a fuller length and gets him to prod forward, that nearly took the edge
slides down the leg side, he attempts to glance it fine but misses
starts off with a good length ball outside off, he gets across and tucks it across the line to midwicket
fullish outside off, he gets forward and taps it to cover
comes into the right hander with the angle, he closes the face of the bat and works it to midwicket
bangs it in shorter, he gets  back and defends
good ball, beats him on the forward prod with the late deviation
lunges forward and defends to the offside
gets forward and defends to the offside
holds the length back, he rocks back and chops it firmly to the offside
gets a good stride forward and defends to the off side
he lunges forward again and pushes wide of cover
the angle is towards the pads this time, he gets forward and pushes through the line back to the bowler
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
taps it softly to the on side and sets off, Sammy gives the charge and nearly barges Kapugedera away but he makes his ground
gets forward and taps it away towards point
slides really wide down the leg side, Sammy's just ambling it here
lands on a good length outside off, he gets forward and steers it to the offside with an angled bat
bangs it in way too short and the lack of pace allows him to wait on it and pull with intent over midwicket, it was too easy for Kapugedera
gets forward and defends to the offside
fuller in length, he gets forward and eases it wide of point
pushes it through the line to mid-on
thrusts his pad forward and defends close to the pad, there;s a stifled appeal for a leg before
very streaky, Benn gets extra bounce, he tries to cut but the ball clips the top edge of his bat and beats the big gap between Browne and Gayle at slip
slides on the pads, he tucks it to fine leg
lunges forward and defends back to the bowler
slides on the pads and he flicks it away down to fine leg
edged and didn't carry! Silva gets a huge stride forward and gets a thick outside edge which goes on the bounce to Gayle at first slip
pushed very softly in front of mid-on, Silva calls and sets off, the throw was too wide
slides on the pads, Sammy errs in line and makes him pay by flicking it off the face of the bat to beat the keeper
tucks him up outside the offstump, he hops and defends
fuller in length, he gets forward and defends
charges down the track, he misreads the full length and checks his stroke as the ball clips his pads and rolls to the on side
lunges forward and defends tocover
gets forward and defends to the offside
lands it outside off, he drives it square of the wicket
jams it in on  a yorker length, he digs it back to the bowler
lands it on a fuller length outside off, he gets forward and defends
back of a length outside off, he gets back and defends
gets forward and pushes it softly in front of cover and sets off
adjusts to a fuller length, he gets forward and pushes it back to the offside
taps it just wide of cover, he contemplates a single but changes his mind as Bravo stops it one handed
gets forward and steers it just wide of cover
rocks back and defends back to the bowler
rocks back at the crease again and punches it firmly wide of cover for a quick single
pitches on a good length outside off, he gets back and defends
gets down for a premeditated paddle and drags that from outside off and places it to fine leg
he eyes a flashy square cut by rocking back at the crease, the ball comes on a little quicker though, he misses it completely
pitches outside off, he gets behind the line and defends to the offside
gets a bit of inward movement, he shapes to flick across the line but misses and gets hit on the pads
hits a good length outside off, he gets forward and defends
gets forward again and taps it back to the bowler
gets it to swerve back into the right-hander, he gets across his stumps and gets a thin inside edge to the on side
gets it to shape inwards again and manages extra bounce, Silva lunges forward and taps it high on the bat to point
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
good comeback by Benn as he lands it outside off and gets turn and bounce and beats Silva
beaten! That was mighty close, the arm ball squares up Silva and the ball nearly creeps between bat and body, it clips the pads and deflects off Browne
defended to cover
slides on the pads, he gets forward and tucks it wide of midwicket
Benn and Kapugedera collide as they take off for the single
pushes that on a fullish length outside off, he taps it back to Sammy
slides on the pads this time on a fullish length and he flicks it on its way to fine leg
hits a good length outside off, he gets forward and steers it to point
too short and wide, he reaches out and angles it down to third man
keeps it short and brings the line closer to the offstump, he reaches out and steers it to point
gets forward to a short of a length delivery and taps it to point
turns it wide of midwicket, beats Samuels and they pick up a single
dabs it with an angled bat and beats short third man
gets forward and defends to the region of short cover
gets across his stumps, turns his wrists and tucks it wide of midwicket
stays back at the crease and dabs it behind sqaure on the offside, he can't beat Gayle at short third man
gets forward and defends to the offside
hits a good length outside off, he gets forward and taps it to mid-off
gets his bat down on an angle and steers it to cover
gets his bat down on an angle again and this time he steers it wide of point
gets it to cut back into the right hander, he pushes it back to the bowler
fires that towards leg and he attempts a sweep, it clips his pads and Sammy does well to run from short fine-leg and cut it off
gets on his knee and sweeps from outside off to deep square leg
gives him width outside off, he makes room and cuts to short third man
tossed up outside off, Kapugedera reads the flight early and scoops that with control over extra cover
gets well forward and defends back to the bowler
stands far out of his crease, Sammy pitches it full and he gets well forward and defends
good shot, Sammy bangs it in too short and that allows Silva time to rock back and pull over the vacant square leg region
gets forward and pushes it through the line to mid-on
opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of cover on the front foot
turned to short midwicket
hits a good length outside off, he opens the face of the bat again and angles it down to third man
gets on the front foot and defends back to Benn
slides on the pads, he covers his stumps and flicks it across the line to midwicket
gets down very quickly on his knees and sweeps that with intent to deep square leg
gets forward and tucks it wide of midwicket for a single
steers it just wide of Gayle at short third man and sets off, the throw is quick but Kapugedera is quicker as he makes his ground before Browne whips off the bails, the third umpire has a look
tucked to midwicket
hits a good length outside off, he gets forward and defends to point
fires in a yorker outside off, he gets forward and digs it out well
the slower ball, he waits for it at the crease and dabs it down to third man
quicker ball this time and Silva makes room and dabs it down to third man
he attempts another glide down to third man but is cramped for room, he ends up getting an under edge to the keeper
makes room and cuts it square of the wicket to the sweeper cover ( Benn)
bangs it in on a good length outside off and tucks him for room, he defends softly back to the bowler
gets a half stride forward and taps this softly back to the bowler
Edwards slides on the pads, the ball moves in after pitching and he gets a thin edge off the pads on the leg glance, enough to beat the diving Browne
fuller and swinging in , he gets a thick inside edge onto his pads as he tries to flick across the line
attempts to fire in a yorker on middle and leg, he gets across the stumps early and whips it to fine leg
Sammy slides on the pads, he gets across and flicks it wide of fine leg
hits a fullish length outside off, he gets forward and pushes it wide of cover
overpitches outside off and he eases it in the arc between mid-off and cover
pitches it up on middle and leg, he chips it on the up to long-on
superb placement, Sammy strays on the pads, Silva flicks it on the up and the ball races over the turf, he bisects the gap between fine leg and deep backward square leg
Kapugedera flicks it off his pads towards fine leg and that brings up an excellent fifty, his third in ODIs
aims for the yorker but slides on the pads, he picks it on a fulish length and whips it wide of midwicket
holds the length back outside off, Silva attempts a dangerous dab down to third man but is beaten for pace
digs in the bouncer, the ball sails way over Silva;s arched back and it was good enough to be called a wide
fires in another bouncer, Silva goes for the hook but the ball catches him flush on the glove and lobs safely in front of short midwicket
Edwards slides down the leg side, poor ball
grants him to much width outside off, he makes a little room and slices it hard to beat backward  point to bring up his 50
fullish outside the offstump, he drives through the line to deep cover
he rocks back and punches with the turn to long-on
he rocks back and punches with the turn to long-on
charges down the track, he attempts to launch it over long-on but gets a leading edge and the ball lands safe over extra cover
steps down the track and pushes this firmly to long-on
gets forward and clips this wide of midwicket
starts off his new spell with a full delivery on the pads, he works it away to the on side
fullish and swinging in again, he pushes this easily to long-on
the slower ball, lands on a fullish length on middle and leg, he tucks it to midwicket
fires in a yorker on middle and leg, he makes room, charges down the track and pushes it towards mid-on, Benn runs across from mid-off and cuts it off
lovely shot, Taylor thuds it in short, Silva gets on top of the bounce and pulls this with intent over midwicket, the ball slams the Digicel ad hoarding
the slower ball, he pushes to long-on
the quicker one, he pushes this across the line to midwicket
he charges down the track this time, he picks the slower ball a little late but he checks his stroke and flat-bats it to long--on
risky run, he steers it wide of point and sets off fast, Kapugedera dives at the crease but the throw was wide
full outside off, he drives to cover
makes room and drives it firmly, Benn drives at mid-off to intercept it
walks across his stumps and tries to flick it to fine leg, the ball hits him on the pads just over the stumps and that prompts an appeal, umpire Duncan shakes his head
gets an inside edge and the ball races to long leg

half volley outside off and Kapugedera slams that hard past extra cover, the fielder at deep cover runs across and cuts it off on the slide, the ball rebounds off his palms, unfortunately his boot was touching the rope as he gathered the ball again
yorker, dug out back to the bowler
low full toss down the leg side, Silva gets across and paddles it way to fine leg, premeditated and very effective
good length outside off, he taps it wide of cover
bangs it in short, he steps down, checks his stroke and pulls along the ground to the on side
good length outside off, he places it to point but they turn down the single
pulls with intent over square leg, the fielder runs across and cuts it off
steps down the track and flat-bats it over the bowler, long-on runs across and cuts it off
slides on the pads, he rocks back at the crease and pulls towards short fine-leg
lovely shot, he picks the flight early, stays back at the crease and launches him effortlessly over deep midwicket, that went half a dozen rows back
he attempts a risky single by pushing it towards cover
that's out of the ground! Kapugedera picks the flight early, charges down the track and carts Benn straight over his head and that sails over the pavilion roof
rocks back and pushes this wide of midwicket
digs it in short, Kapugedera goes for the pull but meets the ball flush on the visor, they take a run as the ball rolls to the on side
Bravo gets the breakthrough, Silva makes room and tries to carve this one over midwicket but can't beat Gayle
charges down the track and misses, he makes room too and the ball just climbs over the stumps
banged in short, he makes room and upper cuts it safe from the reach of Benn at third man
chipped on the up well wide of Bravo, long-on picks it up
slower ball, he gets forward and taps it wide of cover for a single
take that! Edwards bangs in short, Kapugedera charges down the track and flat bats him over long-on
Edwards over compensates by dishing out a full toss and Kapugedera shuffles across and paddles it with ease to long leg
bangs it in short, he goes for the pull but the ball lobs off the gloves to the on side
Vaas makes room and tucks this to the on side, there's no body to back the throw at the bowler's end and they take  an extra run
makes room and pulls this to deep midwicket
makes room outside off and carves it down to third man
makes room and pushes a full delivery down to long-on
good delivery, pitches just a little too full to go for the lofted drive and Vaas closes the face of the bat and pushes to long-on
continues round the wicket to the right hander, he bangs it in short, Kapu goes for the pull but plays too early as the ball clips the top of his pad and rolls to the offside
full outside off, he drags it to long-on
full on middle and leg, he slogs it to long-on
low full toss on middle and leg, he shuffles and fails to beat the gap behind short fine leg
makes room and pushes this one firmly down the ground to long-on
Dropped: The slower ball, he makes room and flat-bats it back to Edwards but his reflexes are quick enough for him to cup his hands behind the ball
fires in the yorker, he makes room to slog but misses and the ball nearly shaves the legstump

he falls for 95! Edwards dishes out an inswinging yorker, Kapugedera gets across his stumps and tries to paddle that one wide of short fine leg but the ball strikes him on the boot, Umpire Duncan is convinced
pushes it to the on side

inn2.comm: gentle away swinger to start off, hits outside off, Gayle shoulders arms
Gayle goes tentatively on the backfoot and lets it go, there's that away movement again
swings away from the left hander again and Gayle lets this go with much more confidence
works up a bit more pace this time as he lands it outside off and moves it away from Gayle
lands it further away from the offstump, that does nothing to trouble Gayle as he lets this one go as well
he gets that outswing again to Gayle who moves his front foot across and shoulders arms
comes from over the wicket, lands it on off stump and it keeps a little low, Smith manages to dig it off
Smith shuffles across his stumps and tucks it away easily past midwicket
good delivery, pitches just outside off and gets good lift, Gayle rather tentatively withdraws his bat away
Gayle continues to look circumspect outside his offstump as he pokes at an away swinger
skids through outside off at a lively pace, Gayle leaves it with more assurance now
holds the length back outside off, Gayle covers the line and defends to the offside
gets a bit if late swing, Gayle gets across his stumps and defends to the offside
Dropped: Smith shoulders arms to an away swinger and the ball just shaves the face of the bat, Sangakkara dives but doesn't anticipate it early, first runs back and pulls it back
opens the face of the bat and steers this one towards point
beaten, good comeback by Vaas as he squares up Smith outside off
Smith gets across his stumps this time and gets nicely behind the line and defends
similar delivery, he gets across and defends
Gayle gets across to a full delivery and pushes to cover
misfield, Gayle tucks it straight to Udawatte at midwicket who takes his eye off it and lets it slip through
Kulasekara teases him outside off with a well pitched up delivery ans Gayle nearly falls for the bait as he goes for the drive
pitched a little shorter, he gets across and taps it to the offside

half volley outside off and Gayle gives it the treatment by getting forward to the pitch of the ball and creaming it through the gap between mid-off and cover, Tharanga gives the chase but the outfield was too quick
pitches it full and wide and Gayle throws the kitchen sink at it and misses
slides on the pads, Vaas loses his line there and Smith eases it off with a flick of the wrists and places it well wide of fine leg who's fielding very square
pitches outside off and straightens, he does well to let it go
pitches on a good length outside off, Smith gets nicely behind the line and defends
Vaas gives him very little room outside off as he gets behind the line and defends again to mid-off
a little too full outside off and swinging away, Smith leans onto the drive and glides it to third man
teases him on the corridor outside off and gayle tentatively leaves it
strays on his pads, he rocks back and pulls to fine leg
pitches on a good length, Gayle shapes to pull but the ball isnt short enough for that stroke, he thuds it down the pitch
pitches outside off, he moves across and steers it towards cover
Gayle blindly tries to crash that through the off side, he doesn't move his feet and nearly gets a thick edge behind the wicket
and again, Gayle's really struggling against the away swingers, another swish through the off side meets thin air
he brings the line closer to the batsman this time, he taps it to mid-off
lands outside off, comes back in, he defends
this one pitches on middle and just shapes away, he gets across his stumps and defends back to the bowler
fuller in length and swinging away, a cover drives is intercepted before the circle
just holds the length back a touch, he gets across his stumps and defends back to the bowler
fuller outside off, he drives off the middle of the bat but fails to beat Silva at backward point
holds the length back outside off but cramps him for room, he goes for the square cut but chops it down to the offside
that should give Gayle a lot of confidence..... He pitches it on a good length and gets it to straighten, Gayle stays back and punches it off the meat of the bat to beat mid-off, all timing there
gets across and taps it down to to the off side
he digs in the bouncer and Gayle reads it early as he swivels and hooks, he gets a thick top edge but the power was enough to ensure a boundary behind the keeper
strays a little wide outside off, Gayle gets forward and drives, he gets a thick outside edge past second slip, third man was too square to cut it off
gets forward and taps it down to cover
gets forward and taps it down to backward point
beaten.... That was a superb delivery by Vaas, pitches just a shade outside off and moves away a touch, Smith pokes forward. How did that not take the edge?
gets forward and drives through the line wide of cover
pitches outside off and comes back in, he gets behind the line and defends
strays a little wide outside off and gets it to move away, Gayle lets it go
this one comes back in a little, same result as Gayle plays it safe and lets it go
fuller in length, draws Gayle forward as he steers it to cover
thuds it in just short of a length, Smith rocks back and cuts hard, the ball bounces high to Dilshan at backward point
strays a bit on the pads, he gets across and tucks it wide of midwicket
strays wide outside off, Gayle doesn't chase it, umpire Clyde Duncan signals a wide
strays on the danger area - the pads - fortunately for the bowler the ball trickles to short fine-leg off the pads
take that... he bowls it full outside off and gets it to sit up on Gayle who lofts across the line and clears midwicket
grants him width outside off again, he reaches out and scoops it high over backward point, not the most well controlled stroke
he carves it high off the top edge and Mendis at third man and nearly pulls off a stunner
full delivery outside oiff, he gets forward and lets it go
gets across the stumps this time and defends through the line
teases him outside the offstump, he moves back and tentatively lets it go
full outside off, he gets forward and pushes to cover
pitches outside the offstump and shapes away, Gayle lets it go
pitches outside off and straightens a little, Gayle gets well forward and meets the ball on the pads, Vaas appeals, Taufel shakes his head
Chance! Smith pulls and gets a top edge, Kulasekara and the fielder from short fine leg go for the catch but Kulasekara withdraws and the fielder dives in vain, Kulasekara should have called for it
left alone to the keeper
pushed to mid-off
Gayle stays at the crease to size up a short delivery and he gives it the treatment by pulling it mercilessly over long-on, he gave that a real thwack
full outside off, he makes room and tries to drag that through the on side but can't beat mid-on
Gayle perfects the shot this time as he drags another full delivery outside off across the line and this time beats midwicket
strays a bit on the pads, he works his wrists and glances it wide of square leg
he strays on the pads and Gayle glances it down to fine leg
holds the length back outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
gets across the stumps and tucks it to the on side
lands just a shade outside off, he tentatively lets it go
pitches outside off and seams away, he offers no stroke again
Smith sees the width outside off and goes for a wild swing through the off side and misses
pitches outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
pitches fractionally outside the line of legstump, Smith shapes to flick it to the on side but the ball skids through and traps him on the pad, umpire Duncan is convinced
Sarwan carries on from where he left off from the Test, he latches onto a short of a length ball outside off and punches it wide of the diving cover, that's a boundary to get off the mark
gets on the back foot and defends
pitches outside off and shapes away, he gets behind the line and defends
Gayle gets across his stumps and tries to work it to the on side but the extra bounce forces him to adjust his stroke and play it with soft hands
pitches outside off, he pushes it through the line to cover
shuffles just a touch and clips it towards midwicket
gets across and tucks it in front of mid-on, Gayle calls for the single but Sarwan firmly declines it
full outside off, he gets forward and defends
pitches just short of a good length, Gayle gets back and punches it back off the meat of the bat
short and wide, sarwan sizes up the width and goes for the cut but misses
continues to strays wide outside off and this one is fuller, he lets it go
Sarwan gets forward and taps it softly just wide of short cover, he sets off for a quick single
defended back to the bowler
low full toss outside off, Gayle latches onto it quickly and times it crisply just wide of mid-on who dives in vain to his right
covers the line and defends to the offside
Gayle gets across and steers it towards cover with an angled bat
pitches this wide outside off, no turn, he reaches out and cuts
the offcutter, turns away, Gayle taps it to the offside
he grips the ball before the seam, turns away, Gayle taps it to the offside
turns in from outside off, gets good bounce and traps Sarwan high on the pad
strays on the pads, he gets back and pushes it to square leg
pushed in flatter on offstump, he gets on the backfoot and pushes it wide of cover
lovely shot, Amersinghe dishes out a half volley and Sarwan eases it through the line and creams it past extra cover
pushes it through the line just wide of mid-on
fulish outside off, it was in the slot to drive but Gayle creams it straight to mid-off
slides on the pads, he pushes it wide of mid-on
shapes to cut, he thuds it along the pitch back to the bowler
the slower ball, he quietly pushes it back to the bowler
runs in and bowls a straighter one, Gayle probably expects it to turn and he watchfully lets it go
this one also comes on straight, Gayle offers no stroke
the conventional offcutter, Gayle gets down for a premediated paddle and places it wide of short fine-leg
the doosra, Gayle doesnt quite read it and he falls over back wards as he attempts a sweep, the ball rolls to the on side
the legbreak this time but he slides it wide down the leg side and beats the keeper
close shout for leg before, sarwan is squared up by the offcutter, gets across his stumps and shapes to cut and the ball strikes him outside the line of offstump, Taufel shakes his head
pitches it short and wide outside off, he reaches out and cuts to deep point
good length outside off, he gets back and shoulders arms
aims for the yorker but turns into a low full toss, he pushes it through the line to the sweeper cover
squares him up with the extra bounce as he tries to cut, that wasn't far from the edge
steers it down towards point, some agile fielding restricts a single
wide and just a little fuller, he reaches out and taps it towards third man
pitches outside leg, straightens, he shuffles and gets rapped on the pads
flighted outside leg, he gets forward and defends
the legbreak, he gets forward and gets a thick inside edge onto hos pads
the offspinner, Sarwan is confused here as he tucks it to short midwicket
hits him low on the pad as he tries to defend, he survives  a confident shout
defended back to the bowler
slightly short of a length, he rocks back and punches to the offside
short of a length again, he rocks back and punches to cover
pushed towrds midwicket
this time he gets his placement right as he punches it to long-off
pitches wide outside off, he dabs it to third man
the offcutter, he taps it towards cover
slides on the pads, he tucks it across the line wide of midwicket
lands a straighter delivery on the pads and he clips it wide of midwicket to bring upto his fifty
lunges well forward and defends off the pads, half hearted appeal follows
pitches outside off, he lunges forward and pushes it to the offside
gets forward and steers it through the vacant point region
fires in a yorker outside off, he pushes it back to the bowler
the legcuter this time, hw goes for the drive and misses, Sangakkara is upto the stumps
slightly wide outside off, he reaches out and cuts
slides down the leg side, he nudges it off his bat and Mendis at fine leg dives to cut it off, the ball rebounds off him and trickles to the rope, he tries to kick it away on the second attempt
pushed to mid-on
grants him width, he reaches out and drives it square to third man
pushed to long-on
pitches outside off, he rocks back and punches to long-off
slides on the pads this time, he shuffles and glances it off the face of the bat fine, enough to beat fine leg
wide outside off, he makes room and cuts towards third man, they take the first run fast and complete the second comfortably
slides on the pads, he glances it behind square on the on side
fires in a full length delivery outside off, he jams it out and the fielder at cover runs towards mid-off and throws himself forward to save it, the ball rebounds off him and they take the run
gets on the backfoot and tucks it to square leg
gets forward and defends
lunges forward again and defends to the offside
slides down the legside, he gets down to sweep but misses
the offcutter, Sarwan rocks back, plays it late and cuts it to deep point
rocks back at the crease and tries to flick it wide of midwicket, he;s trapped on the pads
that's his debut wicket....Pitches in line with legstump from over the wicket, it comes on straight and Gayle pokes forward to defend, he's hit in line with the stumps and Taufel is convinced
pitches just outside off and comes back in, he covers the line and defends
opens the face of the bat and steers it towards cover, he thinks of a single but changes his mind
defended back to the bowler

the bowling change works! Kulasekara pitches it fractionally outside the line off offstump and gets it to move away, Sarwan tamely tries to steer that towards third man but gets a thick edge to Sangakkara. His foot movement was minimal
fires in a fullish delivery outside off, he opens the face of the bat and a misfield by Dilshan at point allows a single

Sri Lanka claw back quickly.... Kulasekara pitches that outside the line of offstump and gets it to seam back inwards after pitching, Samuels gets across his stumps but is very lazy on the stroke, the ball skids through and hits him in line of middle and leg, umpire Duncan raises the finger
fires in a yorker length swinging away, he reaches out and digs it out wide of point
Bravoi gets a thick inside edge onto his pads but Amerasinghe appeals confidently
pitches outside off and comes back in, he plays it with an angled bat and steers it towards gully
fullish outside off, he tucks it towards mid-on
bangs that in short and gets a lot of bounce off the pitch, he goes for the upper cut but the extra pace beats him
strays on the shins, he shuffles and tucks it past the vacant areas at square leg
good ball, that keeps a little low outside off and slices Bravo in half
Bravo tries to whip that across the line but places it straight to short midwicket, now the required rate in exactly 6 an over
slides on the pads again and he places it straight to mid-on, pressure building here
thuds it in short and wide down the legside
gets across his stumps and taps this towards cover
Class act by Bravo.... He pitches it too short and wide outside off, Bravo stands tall, gets his elbow high and punches it off the meat of the bat past point and cover
slides towards the pads this time, he pushes it with a straight bat down to mid-on
jams in a yorker length ball outside off, he digs it out to point
half volley outside off, that deserved to be smashed as Chanderpaul drives across the line and beats mid-on
he gets forward and taps it just wide of the region of extra cover, the fielder runs forward from the deep but the pair steal a second run, good running
full outside the offstump, he gets forward and steers it to sweeper cover
banged in short of a length, Bravo reads the length early and gets on top of the bounce as he pulls ob one leg over midwicket

he follows up the boundary with a huge six, Amerasinghe pitches it short and Bravo stays back at the crease and flat bats it over extra cover, unfortunately the ball strikes a photographer flush on the head at the boundary
Chanderpauul gets into the act now as he walks across his stumps and flicks it high over mid-on
good length outside leg, he flicks it to deep square leg
good length on middle and leg, he rocks back and pulls to deep square leg
defended back to the bowler
left alone to the keeper
gets forward and defends
the legbreak, Bravo reads the flight early and launches it over the deep cover boundary, the ball just lands over the rope
gets across and pushes that to the on side, short fine leg runs forward and cuts that off
looped on middle and leg, he gets back and pushes to deep square leg
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
pushed in flatter, he gets forward and gets a thin edge onto his pads
delicately played by Chanderpaul as he opens the face of the bat and glides it to third man, a sliding stop cuts off the boundary
rocks back and cuts square, Dilsha dives at point and a fumble allows a single
he rocks back and punches to long-on
gets across his stumps and works it to mid-on
pitches on middle and leg, he gets across and tucks it towards midwicket
full outside off and pushed to the covers
flighted outside off, he gets back and defends to the off side
pitches outside off, he rocks back and steers it to mid-off
pitches it fairly short on middle and leg, he rocks back and pushes it with the turn to deep midwicket
shuffles across his stumps and flicks it to the on side for a single
flighted outside off, the offbreak, he gets forward and smothers the turn
lands on middle and leg, he rocks back and tucks it wide of midwicket
stays back at the crease and clips it high over midwicket
fast offbreak thudded in short, Chanderpaul plays it very late and tucks it to short fine leg
lovely shot, Kapugedera overpitches outside off and Bravo takes the aerial route and scoops that over short cover's outstretched arms
the slower ball, turns into a high full toss, he pulls to deep square leg
defended on the backfoot
rocks back and cuts to point
the offbreak doesn't turn, he defends back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, he rocks back and cuts square of the wicket on the of side
excellent running, he taps it in the region of silly point and sets off, Dilshan dives and takes aim in one motion and misses
slides on the pads, he tucks it across the line to deep midwicket
pitches outside off, he leans forward and steers it wide of point
another single, he shuffles across his stumps and works it wide of the vacant midwicket region
tempts him with width, he goes for an expansive square drive and misses
slides on the pads, he whips it across the line to the on side
full outside the offstump, he gets forward and angles it to sweeper cover
slides on the pads, he pushes it through the line to long-on
opens the face of the bat and glides it delicately to third man
adjusts to a shorter length outside off, Bravo's squared up by the extra lift as he tries to cut to third man

terrible mixup.... Dilshan delivers from round the wicket, Chanderpaul works it against the turn to short fine-leg, Bravo eyes a single and charges down the track, Chanderpaul was looking at Jayawardene who fired in the throw to the keeper, Sangakkara fired the throw to the bowler but by then, both batsmen were at the same end
slides on the pads, he turns it across the line wide of midwicket
fullish on middle and leg, Bravo pushes through the line to long-on
opens the face of the bat and slices it straight to point
pushed back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, he takes a few paces down the track, checks his stroke and whips it behind square on the on side
Kapugedera bowls from round the wicket, Chanderpaul gets down early and pulls that off the front foot and places it wide of short fine leg, lovely improvisation there
full outside off, steered to point
slides on the pads, he tucks it across the line to deep square leg
pitches on off and cuts back in, he closes the face of the bat and tucks it very close to the pads to the on side
pushes it softly to mid-off, can't get the single
bowls that wide outside off, he withdraws the stroke
tries to cut square but he's cramped for room, the ball skids through quickly
gets forward and eases it through the line to long-on
flighted outside off, he lunges forward and softly taps it back to the bowler
looped on the pads, he tuck it to the on side
pushed in flatter, he gets back and defends on the backfoot
pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
starts off with a loosener, swinging in on the pads, he whips it across the line to fine leg
grants him a lot of width outside off and he stretches out and punches wide of extra cover
another loosener from Vaas and this time Browne just scoops it over cover for a single
gets across his stumps and pushes it back to the bowler
doesn't have much width to work with but Chanderpaul adjusts by steering it with an angled bat wide of point, they scamper through for the run
offers the full face of the bat and punches it past the bowler, mid-off picks it up and they go through for another quick run
strays on the pads, he shuffles and works it to fine leg
gets down to sweep and he chips this over square leg
gets to the pitch of the ball and pushes through the line to long-on
pitches outside off, he plays a square drive but can't beat point
he tries to steer this wide of the infield on the off side but fails again
a fumble at point allows a single
he gets down for a premeditated paddle and gets a single to fine leg
That missed by   a whisker!  The arm ball slices Browne in half, that misses the outside edge and the stumps
defended back to the bowler
pitches on middle and leg, he tucks it to midwicket
another dot ball, he shapes to pull but thuds it onto his pads
he turns it to the on side and Kapugedera dives to cut off a single at square leg
he takes  a few paces down the pitch and places it wide of deep midwicket
gets on his knee and sweeps that from outside the offstump
the crowd go up in raptures as Browne gives Dilshan the charge and carts him high through the line over long-on
Flighted on middle and leg, Browne tries to go downtown again and this time he fails to clear the fielder, Mendis at long-on runs to his left and catches it
flighted outside off, he softly pushes it to cover
he tries to beat the gap at the covers but fails again
the offbreak, pitches outside off and cuts back in fairly sharply, Sammy rocks back and confidently cuts it wide of point
cramps him for room, it's the straighter ball, he cuts very close to the body to point
slides on the pads, he flicks it across the line to deep midwicket
the flipper! Sammy is totally squared up at the crease as the ball lands on offstump and skids through and whips the top of offstump. Mendis is quite a revelation already
rocks back, waits for the turn and cuts it past the diving short cover
gets forward to the pitch of the ball, smothers the spin and drives through the line to long-on
cramps him for room straight away, he shapes to slices it through the offside but misses
jammed in on a full length outside off, he digs it out straight to cover
low full toss, he pushes that firmly in front of mid-on and sets off fast, the throw is wide and Chanderpaul just makes it
stays back at the crease and flat bats it firmly but can't beat mid-off
the slower ball, lands on the blockhole and Taylor digs it out past the diving Kulasekara
another low full toss, he slams it through the line to long-off and keeps the strike
he takes a few paces down the track and tucks it softly wide of the bowler
nope, he stays back, waits for the legbreak and tucks it wide of square leg
clipped away to the deep wide of deep midwicket, they scamper through for the secondd run
he lunges forward and pushes it wide of cover
Bang! Taylor stays at the crease, waits for the legbreak and slog sweeps him high over long-on
Rush of blood....  Mendis dishes out another legbreak, Taylor stays at the crease and tries to repeat the slog which fetched him the six but he lands it down Silva's throat at long-on
Benn tries to cut but he's cramped for room and he misses
beaten again, he's cramped for room outside off, he goes on the walk and he struggles to connect
makes room and charges down the track, the ball is full and Benn is all at sea as he misses again
another yorker length outside off, he goes for another slog and he misses

Benn's nightmare ends, the ball is full on off stump, Benn finally connects, he swings across the line and Jayawardene at midwicket has a shy at the stumps and hits, Taufel doesn't bother to call for the replay
Chanderpaul swings and he connects well, good enough ton beat mid-off and the ball races away
Nope, no single, he bowls a low full toss and Edwards can only slice it to short cover
full outside off and he gets the single this time, beats the gap between point and cover
dishes out a low full toss, he makes room and places it to long-on,the throw is sharp
Low full toss, he goes on the walk and clubs it across the line past the diving midwicket
well well! Vaas over pitches outside off, the field is close and he creams that past mid-off

This is the stuff of dreams! Off all times Vaas has to bowl a full toss! Chanderpaul waits for the gift, clubs that across the line and the ball just goes sailing over Jayawardene at deep midwicket. He waits and waits for the ball to clear the rope, a rather long and agonising one, he breaks out in celebration and the entire troupe from the dressing room rush onto the field and crowd around him. We can just imagine the scenes at Unity Village in Guyana, Chanderpaul's home
